# Define the function to compute exponential using series expansion
exp <- function(x, k) {
  # Initialize the result with the first term (1)
  result <- 1
  
  # Add the terms of the series expansion up to k terms
  for (i in 1:k) {
    result <- result + (x^i) / factorial(i)
  }
  
  return(result)
}

# Example of usage
x <- 2
k <- 3
exp(x, k)  # This will calculate 1 + x + x^2/2! + x^3/3!
